interpretation: The White Small Square represents simplicity, emptiness, clarity, and neutrality. This card encourages you to simplify your life and let go of unnecessary distractions. By emptying your mind, you can gain clarity and focus on what truly matters. The White Small Square also represents neutrality and impartiality. It reminds you to remain open-minded and unbiased when making decisions or dealing with conflicts. This card may indicate a need to take a step back and assess a situation objectively. Embrace the simplicity and clarity of the White Small Square to find balance and peace in your life.
